item.title: About
item.description: Who am I? Great question! As of right now, I am an engineer with a bit of spare time. What do I do? Not sure. Møøn will start selling hardware to consumers at the computer and mobile market. Honestly, this about page needs to be way longer. Maybe something motivational about how we're different, and treat our workers like family or some deceptive message about the work culture. Maybe how we're different from all the thousands upon thousands of engineering firms out there.

item.title: First Post
item.description: After two days, I'm finally able to talk to the world using the Hugo framework!
